hero.subheader: Cornell is big. Orientation week is messy. With O-Week, new students can find orientation week events, keep track of their favorites, and know where and when to go.

1.title: Find It.
1.description: Search for new events by keyword.

2.title: Remind Me.
2.description: Be notified before any events required for your major.

3.title: Get There.
3.description: Directions to any event are just a tap away.
